General.Name: Nanjing Doron Technology Corp
General.Description: DuoLun Technology Corporation Ltd. develops motor vehicle driver intelligent training, testing, and application systems in China. It offers smart vehicle administration, smart city, and smart vehicle inspection. The company was formerly known as Nanjing DuoLun Technology Corporation Ltd. and changed its name to DuoLun Technology Corporation Ltd. in October 2017. DuoLun Technology Corporation Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Nanjing, China.
